system.requirement: Once you become stranded in the distant past or distant future...

abilities.description: You have learned how to adapt the raw materials of the current era to your needs. You can now @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.703964b8d02355b8]{Resupply} using precursor technology or the rusted scraps of the past and add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

You've modified your ship such that it can offer substitute comforts and equipment for gathering resources that you would normally find in a settlement. When you land your ship in a safe location, you may make the @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.3de42d2d3cb78855]{Sojourn} move without needing to be within a community.
As you fight to preserve your sanity through isolation, you may make Connection Moves with animal lifeforms and inanimate objects.
